Worldwide: biggest ski resorts

All 6122 ski resorts worldwide sorted according to size (total slope length).

Biggest ski resort worldwide (600 km)

The ski resort Les 3 Vallées – Val Thorens/​Les Menuires/​Méribel/​Courchevel is the biggest ski resort worldwide. The total slope length is 600 km.

Racines-Giovo

Snow fun in South Tyrol

Enjoy fun times in the snow at 2,150 metres! A modern gondola lift whisks skiers and snowboarders up above the treeline to attractive slopes, a snowpark and fun park.

Current info
6 peaks on the Königstour

Mühlbach – Dienten – Maria Alm – and back

One of the absolute highlights in Hochkönig is the Königstour. This panoramic ski tour covers an impressive 35 continuous kilometres of slopes and an altitude difference of around 7,500 metres over 6 mountain peaks.
